about_the_game:
Escape the treacherous depths of Immanis, where danger lurks at every turn. Navigate through dark and mysterious caverns, harvest valuable resources, and outsmart relentless enemies as you fight to reach the surface. Will you survive the depths and find your way to freedom?

This is demo version for the game, it contains limited features

Mine

Harness the power of specialised mining equipment to extract valuable resources from established mines. As you tap into each deposit, you gather the essential materials required for your journey and technological advancements. Your success in mining operations is crucial for survival and uncovering the mysteries that lie ahead.

Combat

Prepare for intense battles where you'll face waves of relentless enemies. Develop your combat skills to fend off the creatures of the deep and survive their increasingly fierce attacks. Your survival depends on your ability to adapt and overcome the adversities of this hostile environment.

Upgrade

Progress through the game allows you to upgrade your engineer's abilities, enhance your ship's capabilities, and augment your weapons to increase their power. Strategic upgrades are essential to withstand tougher enemies and explore more treacherous zones.
